org.cloudgraph.hbase.io

Interface TableWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TableOperation, TableState
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphTableWriter

    public interface TableWriter
extends TableOperation
    Provides access to the operational, configuration and other state information required for write operations on a single graph table.

    Acts as a container for one or more RowWriter elements and encapsulates the HBase client Put and Delete operations for use in write operations across one or more graph rows within a table.

    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
    See Also:
    RowWriter
